questions.question: What keyword is used to declare a variable in JavaScript?
questions.explanation: var declares variables with function scope.

questions.question: What console method displays messages for debugging?
questions.explanation: console.log outputs text to the browser console.

questions.question: What data type represents whole or decimal numbers?
questions.explanation: Number handles all numeric values in JavaScript.

questions.question: What operator adds two values together?
What keyword defines a reusable block of code?
What statement executes code conditionally?
questions.explanation: if executes code when conditions are true.

questions.question: What loop repeats a specific number of times?
What data structure stores ordered collections?
questions.explanation: Arrays store multiple values in order.

questions.question: What method gets an element by its ID?
questions.explanation: getElementById retrieves elements using their id attribute.

questions.question: What event fires when a button is clicked?
questions.explanation: The click event responds to mouse clicks.
